definitions.text: (sports) a bodily position adopted in some sports (such as diving or skiing) in which the knees are bent and the thighs are drawn close to the chest
a narrow flattened pleat or fold that is stitched in place
a straight sword with a narrow blade and two edges

examples: insert your ticket into the slot

definitions.text: make a tuck or several folds in
draw together into folds or puckers
